com.crudetech.matcher

Class Point2DMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crudetech.matcher.Point2DMatcher

  • public final class Point2DMatcher
extends Object
    Creates Matcher implementations that compares Point2D using a tolerance: 
         assertThat(new Point2D.Double(2, 4), is(equalTo(new Point2D.Double(2, 4), withTol(1.e-2)));
